POPUP.REMIND_PASSWORD_IN_EMAIL: Email with link to recover password has been sent to you

ERROR.VALIDATION_FAILED: The user name or password must not be empty.
ERROR.NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to login.
ERROR.ERROR: No response from server or server error. Try again later.
ERROR.ERC_AUTH_USER_NAME: The OAuth authentication was not successful. Contact your system administrator for assistance.
ERROR.ERC_AUTH_EMPTY_EMAIL: Unable to login user with undefined email

BROWSERS.BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED: can not be used to join the meeting. Please try one of the supported browsers.
BROWSERS.BROWSER_OUT_OF_DATE: is out of date. Please update your browser for the best experience.
BROWSERS.VERSION_EXCLUSION_FOR_WEBRTC:
Your browser version does not support audio/video. For a better collaboration experience,
try another version, other supported browsers or download the client.
BROWSERS.VERSION_EXCLUSION_FOR_DATE_ONLY:
Your browser version does not support web conferencing. For a better collaboration experience,
try another version, other supported browsers or download the client.
BROWSERS.OLD_EDGE: Your browser is not compatible with Avaya Meetings. Please switch to Google Chrome or the latest Microsoft Edge for the best experience.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Avaya Settings

USER_TAB.DELEGATED_TITLE: Delegates who can schedule meetings into my meeting rooms

ROOM_TAB.MODERATOR_PIN_NOTE: Participants must enter this PIN to use moderator controls.
ROOM_TAB.ENTRY_PIN_NOTE: Participants must enter this PIN to join your meetings.
ROOM_TAB.ALLOW_REQUESTS: Allow requests to join locked meetings
ROOM_TAB.ALWAYS_RECORD_MEETING: Turn on recording automatically at the start of meetings
ROOM_TAB.RECORDING_NOT_SUPPORTED: Recording is not supported for this Virtual Room
ROOM_TAB.WAITING_ROOM: Place participants in a 'waiting room' until the moderator joins
ROOM_TAB.TERMINATE_MEETING: Terminate meeting after the last moderator leaves
ROOM_TAB.ONETIME_PIN: Use one-time PIN for each meeting
ROOM_TAB.AUDIO_PROMPTS_LANGUAGE: Audio Prompt Language for Guest Users:
ROOM_TAB.MAX_PARTICIPANTS_TO_PLAY_THE_ENTRY_EXIT_: Max Participants to play the entry/exit tone:
Max Participants to play the entry/exit name announcement:
ROOM_TAB.PROTECTED_PARTICIPANT_ID_INFO: Guest users and room systems will be disallowed to join the meeting

LOCAL_TAB.ENABLE_SDC: Enable Scopia Desktop Client on this PC

PREFERENCES_TAB.VIDEO_CALLING_EXPLANATION: Disabling ‘Video Calling’ will join a meeting in audio + presentation mode
PREFERENCES_TAB.REPORT_A_PROBLEM_EML: Report a problem by download the .eml file then open the file
PREFERENCES_TAB.REPORT_A_PROBLEM_EMAIL: Report a problem by manually attach the zipped log file in the email

CLIENT_TAB.DOWNLOAD_OUTLOOK_PLUGIN: Download Meeting Outlook Add-in from Microsoft Store

ERROR.SERVER_NOT_CHANGED: Password has not been changed. Please try again later
ERROR.SERVER_BAD_OLD_PASSWORD: Current password is invalid. Please try again
ERROR.SERVER_UNABLE_USE_OLD_PASSWORD: You are trying to use old password
ERROR.SERVER_CHANGE_FREQUENCY: Password cannot be changed twice within 1 day
ERROR.SERVER_CHANGE_REPEATED_CHARS: ERROR - Must not contain repeated or sequential chars
ERROR.SERVER_CHANGE_COMPLEXITY: ERROR - Must contain the following 4 categories: Lowercase / Uppercase /Numeric / Non-alphanumeric special characters
ERROR.SERVER_INVALID_TOKEN: Password recovery link is expired. Please request it again!
ERROR.CANNOT_MACTH_PASSWORD_HISTORY: Exceeded number of previous passwords that cannot be reused
ERROR.MUST_CONTAIN_4_CATEGORIES: Must contain the following 4 categories: Lowercase / Uppercase /Numeric / Non-alphanumeric special characters

ERROR.ORG_NOT_EXIST: Avaya Meetings is configured to support multiple organizations. You must specify the desired organization as part of the URL. Please contact your Avaya Meetings Administrator for more information
ERROR.RESOURCES_NOT_FETCHED:
Cannot get resources from server.
Error message: {{errorMessage}}
ERROR.NO_DATA_TO_INIT_USER_SERVICE: Can't get data from User Service (picture urls)

LOGS_DIALOG.WARNING:
Disabling logging will delete previous logs.
Do you wish to continue?
LOGS_DIALOG.NO_LOGS: No logs are available. Please start you conference to start logging.

SETTINGS.MEETING_PIN_DIALOG_MESSAGE_CAN_RESERVE: The changed PIN will not affect the active meetings and existing scheduled meetings.
SETTINGS.MEETING_PIN_DIALOG_MESSAGE_CANT_RESERVE: The changed PIN will not affect the active meetings.

ERROR.SESSION_HAS_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please login to continue
ERROR.WINDOW_WIDTH_REACHED_MINIMUM: Sorry your browser window is smaller than the minimum, please expand it so that you can view all of the controls.
ERROR.INCORRECT_PIN: PIN cannot contain sequential or repeated digits.
ERROR.PIN_MIN_LENGTH: PIN must be between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} digits.
ERROR.FAILED_UPLOAD_IMAGE_MESSAGE: Your thumbnail file is too big. Please upload a file that is smaller than 3 Mb.

NOTIFICATION.BAD_BROWSER: Your browser is bringing down your experience!
NOTIFICATION.NO_RESOURCES: Server resources is not fetched yet, please retry later.
NOTIFICATION.NOT_AUTHENTICATED: You must be signed in to view this program
NOTIFICATION.NOT_ACCESS_TO_PROGRAM: You are not allowed to view this program

WEBRTC_MSG.CAPTION: If you continue using this browser...
WEBRTC_MSG.MESSAGE: You can see who’s in your meeting and watch screen sharing, but you’ll need a separate call for audio or video.
WEBRTC_MSG.DO_MORE_MSG: Use one of the browsers below to add audio and video from your computer and share your screen.
WEBRTC_MSG.DO_MORE_DOWNLOAD_MSG: Download the app or use one of the browsers below to add audio and video from your computer and share your screen.
WEBRTC_MSG.DOWNLOAD_HINT: I want the fully featured multimedia experience
WEBRTC_MSG.PRESENTATION_ONLY_HINT: I just need to see the presentation (I’ll use a phone for audio)
WEBRTC_MSG.BAD_BROWSER_HEAD_MESSAGE: This browser doesn’t support Audio & Video meetings.
WEBRTC_MSG.PASTE_MESSAGE: and paste into a recent version of Chrome for audio, video and screen sharing in the browser.
WEBRTC_MSG.SWC_CANT_RUN_IN_AV_HEADER: Web client can't run in this mode.
WEBRTC_MSG.SWC_CANT_RUN_IN_AV_MESSAGE: You can join in view only mode, or use Avaya Workplace

CLIENT_APP.NOT_FOUND: The app was not found. Make sure to allow the browser request when prompted or download the client
CLIENT_APP.CLIENT_NOT_FOUND: The {{clientName}} app could not be found.
CLIENT_APP.IF_INSTALLED: If you already have the {{clientName}} app,

Looks like your app is outdated.
 Upgrade to latest version.

CLIENT_APP.USE_CUMPUTER: Use my computer for audio & video
CLIENT_APP.CHOOSE_APP: Which app would you like to use?
CLIENT_APP.DOES_NOT_SUPPORT: This browser doesn’t support Audio & Video meetings.
CLIENT_APP.MORE_INFO: and paste into a recent version of Chrome or Firefox for audio, video and screen sharing in the browser. or
CLIENT_APP.DONT_HAVE_MICROPHONE: Microphone is needed to join this meeting.
CLIENT_APP.CONNECT_MICROPHONE: Try connecting a microphone and try again.
CLIENT_APP.CHECK_MIC: Please check that your microphone or headset is connected and Join with Browser again.
CLIENT_APP.MIC_WAS_CHECKED:
